scripts.eject: echo 'WARNING: THIS PROCESS CANNOT BE REVERSED - GIT COMMIT FIRST SO YOU CAN ROLL BACK' && echo && echo 'if you really hate create-react-app this much, manually run:' && echo && echo '                                                                 react-scripts eject' && echo
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ build/ src-tauri/target/ package-lock.json yarn.lock
scripts.reindex: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/utility/reindex.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:manikin: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newManikin.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:memory: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newMemory.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:miteC: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newCustomMite.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:miteL: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newLdifMite.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:miteN: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newNetworkMite.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:miteS: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newServiceMite.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
